original_text: And as he was saying these things in his defense, Festus said with a loud voice, “Paul, you are out of your mind; your great learning is driving you out of your mind.”
korean_text: 바울이 이같이 변명하매 베스도가 크게 소리 내어 이르되 바울아 네가 미쳤도다 네 많은 학문이 너를 미치게 한다 하니

sentences.original_text: And as he was saying these things in his defense,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신을 변호하며 이런 말을 하고 있을 때,

sentences.original_text: Festus said with a loud voice,
“Paul, you are out of your mind;
your great learning is driving you out of your mind.”
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 많이 배운 것이 너를 미치게 하는도다.’
